titles: To the honorable committee at Bury The humble petition of the chiefe inhabitants of the liberty of St. Ethelred and of Hoxon Hundred, in the county of Suffocke, on the behalfe of themselves and others well-affected.
author: E. I.
notes: Praying that all well-affected men in the country between the ages of 16 and 40 may be armed.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  Militia --  Early works to 1800.
